member.name: ISyncMgrEventStore.GetEvent
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEventStore.GetEventCount
member.param: A pointer to event count value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEventStore.GetEventEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator for a handler's events.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an instance that can be used to access the handler's events.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEventStore.RemoveEvent
member.param: The count of events to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEventStore
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow a handler to provide its own event store and manage its own sync events, instead of using the default Sync Center event store. These events are displayed in the Sync Results folder.
